title: CLASH- LF TOP, MID/SUPP/ADC
body:
Gold+ team, we already have a jungle and I'm happy to play mid, supp or adc.
-Must have discord
-Comment your summoner name and role below.
Add TheOneMaddy on League if interested!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: D4 Supp here and my duo is a D2 adc player, feel free to add!
Plat 3 TOP and ADC main. IGN Justice

Climbing Gold 2 sup player, main bard
Ign pyr0
